name: igv_reports
title: IGV Reports
summary: Uses the IGV Reports package to create IGV-style image reports of user-requested genomic regions.

inputSpec.name: bam_files
inputSpec.label: Array of BAM files, one per case

inputSpec.name: bam_indices
inputSpec.label: Array of index files for BAMs, one per case

inputSpec.name: sites
inputSpec.label: File of genomic variant sites in BED format. Assumes 1-based positions

inputSpec.name: reference_genome
inputSpec.label: The name of an IGV reference genome - options are hg19 and hg38

outputSpec.name: reports
outputSpec.label: The reports produced by IGV Reports
